name: Mint Chicken
author: TXGIRLSX3
summary: A favorite family recipe that my Mom has made for hundreds of guests.  Fresh lemon juice and mint leaves are a must! Serve over hot cooked white rice.
ingredients: 2  skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - cut into bite-size pieces
½ cup chopped fresh mint leaves
directions: In a medium bowl, mix together the chicken pieces and garlic
Toss with the flour just to coat, and shake off excess
Heat the margarine in a large skillet over medium-high heat
Add the chicken pieces; cook and stir until browned
Add the mint leaves and lemon juice, cover and steam for about 5 minutes, just until the chicken is cooked through
Do not over cook the chicken or it will be tough
